#print Convex.strictConvex' /-
/-- A convex set `s` is strictly convex provided that for any two distinct points of
`s \ interior s`, the line passing through these points has nonempty intersection with
`interior s`. -/
protected theorem Convex.strictConvex' {s : Set E} (hs : Convex ğ•œ s)
    (h : (s \ interior s).pairwise fun x y => âˆƒ c : ğ•œ, lineMap x y c âˆˆ interior s) : StrictConvex ğ•œ s :=
  by
  refine' strictConvex_iff_openSegment_subset.2 _
  intro x hx y hy hne
  by_cases hx' : x âˆˆ interior s; Â· exact hs.open_segment_interior_self_subset_interior hx' hy
  by_cases hy' : y âˆˆ interior s; Â· exact hs.open_segment_self_interior_subset_interior hx hy'
  rcases h âŸ¨hx, hx'âŸ© âŸ¨hy, hy'âŸ© hne with âŸ¨c, hcâŸ©
  refine' (openSegment_subset_union x y âŸ¨c, rflâŸ©).trans (insert_subset.2 âŸ¨hc, union_subset _ _âŸ©)
  exacts[hs.open_segment_self_interior_subset_interior hx hc, hs.open_segment_interior_self_subset_interior hc hy]
#align convex.strict_convex' Convex.strictConvex'
-/

#print Convex.strictConvex /-
/-- A convex set `s` is strictly convex provided that for any two distinct points `x`, `y` of
`s \ interior s`, the segment with endpoints `x`, `y` has nonempty intersection with
`interior s`. -/
protected theorem Convex.strictConvex {s : Set E} (hs : Convex ğ•œ s)
    (h : (s \ interior s).pairwise fun x y => (segment x ğ•œ y \ frontier s).nonempty) : StrictConvex ğ•œ s :=
  by
  refine' hs.strict_convex' <| h.imp_on fun x hx y hy hne => _
  simp only [segment_eq_image_lineMap, â† self_diff_frontier]
  rintro âŸ¨_, âŸ¨âŸ¨c, hc, rflâŸ©, hcsâŸ©âŸ©
  refine' âŸ¨c, hs.segment_subset hx.1 hy.1 _, hcsâŸ©
  exact (segment_eq_image_lineMap ğ•œ x y).symm â–¸ mem_image_of_mem _ hc
#align convex.strict_convex Convex.strictConvex

#print Convex.isPreconnected /-
/-- A convex set is preconnected. -/
protected theorem Convex.isPreconnected {s : Set E} (h : Convex (exprâ„) s) : IsPreconnected s :=
  s.eq_empty_or_nonempty.elim (fun h => h.symm â–¸ isPreconnected_empty) fun hne => (h.is_connected hne).is_preconnected

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprâ„ -/
#print Convex.isPathConnected /-
/-- A nonempty convex set is path connected. -/
protected theorem Convex.isPathConnected {s : Set E} (hconv : Convex (exprâ„) s) (hne : s.nonempty) :
    IsPathConnected s := by
  refine' is_path_connected_iff.mpr âŸ¨hne, _âŸ©
  intro x x_in y y_in
  have H := hconv.segment_subset x_in y_in
  rw [segment_eq_image_lineMap] at H
  exact
    JoinedIn.ofLine affine_map.line_map_continuous.continuous_on (line_map_apply_zero _ _) (line_map_apply_one _ _) H
#align convex.is_path_connected Convex.isPathConnected
-/

/-- A nonempty convex set is connected. -/
protected theorem Convex.isConnected {s : Set E} (h : Convex (exprâ„) s) (hne : s.nonempty) : IsConnected s :=
